description.value:
You gain one of the following powers of your choice. This new power replaces the daily attack power you gained at 15th level.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.91myD56WTAMzC8Ls]{Corroding Weapon}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.IkgebTmiOWl9xDdV]{Storm Weapon}

Published in Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms.
